# Entropy (Domain)
## Overview
| **Deities:** | *Asgardian:* |  |
|---|---|---|
| | *Eberron:* |  |
| | *Golarion:* |  |
| | *Greyhawk:* |  |
| | *Kalamar:* |  |
| | *Krynn:* |  |
| | *Olympian:* |  |
| | *Other:* | *Demon Lords:* Dagon, Obox-ob |
| | *Pharaonic:* |  |
| | *Toril:* |  |

**Granted Power:** Once per day as a standard action, you can channel a bolt of Abyssal entropy as a ranged touch attack, dealing 1d8 points of damage per cleric level you possess. Half the damage is sonic damage, and half is unholy damage that cannot be reduced by sonic resistance or immunity.

**Entropy Domain Spells**

**1** **[[Cause Fear (Spell)|Cause Fear]]****:** Causes one creature with 5 or fewer HD to fl ee for 1d4 rounds.

**2** **[[Vision of Entropy (Spell)|Vision of Entropy]]****:** Confronts target with a vision of the Abyss that causes increasing fear.

**3** **[[Ray of Exhaustion (Spell)|Ray of Exhaustion]]****:** Creates a ray that renders subject [[Exhausted|exhausted]].

**4** **[[Fear (Spell)|Fear]]****:** Subjects within cone flee for 1 round/level.

**5** **[[Waves of Fatigue (Spell)|Waves of Fatigue]]****:** Causes several targets to become [[Fatigued|fatigued]].

**6** **[[Disintegrate (Spell)|Disintegrate]]****:** Causes one creature or object to vanish.

**7** **[[Insanity (Spell)|Insanity]]****:** Afflicts subject with continuous [[Confusion (Spell)|confusion]] effect.

**8** **[[Scintillating Pattern (Spell)|Scintillating Pattern]]****:** Creates twisting colors that confuse, stun, or render subjects [[Unconscious|unconscious]].

**9** **[[Abyssal Rift (Spell)|Abyssal Rift]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Opens a rift in the ground, damaging creatures and structures.
